DOC.brief_summary: Measuring tissue oxygen saturation (St02) in the thenar eminence is emerging as a measurement of resuscitation. However, no study to our knowledge has evaluated the effects of an arterial line in the radial artery supplying this muscle bed on St02. This study will attempt to address the interaction between an arterial line and St02 monitoring in the thenar eminence. As most patients who require aggressive resuscitation will have an arterial line, it is important to understand what if any impact this will have on St02 in the same extremity.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of a Radial Arterial Line's Effect on StO2 Monitoring
DOC.criteria: Standard of care placement of arterial line 18 years of age or older Pregnant females Nursing mothers Prisoners
